scripts.coverage: npm run pretest && cd ../.. && npx jest --collectCoverage
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && tsc && cp  package.json dist/package.json && cp -r types dist/ && cp cf.tsconfig.json dist/cf.tsconfig.json
scripts.link: cd ../core/dist && npm link && cd ../../cf-definedResources && npm link aws-cf-builder-core && cd dist && npm link && cd ../../executor && npm link aws-cf-builder-core aws-cf-builder-defined-resources
scripts.pub: npm run build && npm publish dist
